attributes.action: Immediately dissolve Parliament and call a general election forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current row over MPs expenses, the actions of the Speaker and others has left Parliament in turmoil and the current PM and Government has to accept responsibility for this state of affairs.  Therefore to restore confidence in our democratic system, the PM should call a general election at his earliest possible convenience.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
